definitions.body: free from guilt, clean, innocent, ‖[[חַדִּיק]]:[[נׇקִי וְחַדִּיק ]] Ex 23:7 (E), [[נׇקִי]]: innocent person Job 4:7, Job 17:8, Job 22:19, Job 22:30, Job 27:17, Ps 10:8, Ps 15:5, Pr 1:11; [[נקיים]] Job 9:23; [[דם נקי]] innocent blood, first used in D, De 19:10, De 27:25, 1Sa 19:5, 2Ki 21:16, 2Ki 24:4, Ps 94:2, Ps 106:38, Pr 6:17, Is 59:7, Je 7:6, Je 22:3, Je 26:15; [[דם חנקי]] De 19:13, 1Ki 24:4, Je 22:17; [[הדם הנקי]] De 21:9; [[דם]] [[נקיים]] Je 19:4; [[נׇקִיִ מִדְּמֵי]] 2Sa 3:28 ( + ´[[מֵעִם י]]); [[נְקִי]] [[כַפַּיִם]] Ps 24:4; [[אביונים נקיים]] Je 2:34.
free, exempt from obligations Ge 44:10 (J); from service in war Nu 32:22 (P ; + [[מִן]] person, v. [[מִן]]

definitions.title: 2 d
definitions.body: ), De 24:5, 1Ki 15:22 (cf. Ar. naqiy=un and Wetzst ZMG xxii (1868), 129); c. [[מן]], from oaths Ge 24:41 (J) Jos 2:17, Jos 2:19, Jos 2:20 (JE).
